title.narrative: Power Distribution Enhancement Investment Program - Tranche 2

description.narrative: The immediate priority for investment in the distribution systems is to address the capacity shortfalls that currently result in regular system outages and supply interruptions to customers.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Power distribution systems rehabilitated, augmented and expanded.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Additional 3380 MVA of distribution capacity installed by 2015.

description.narrative: Power distribution systems rehabilitated, augmented and expanded.

title.narrative: Energy losses (T&D Losses) reduced from 20.6% (percentage of gross generation) in 2009 to 20.1% in 2015.

description.narrative: Power distribution systems rehabilitated, augmented and expanded.
